1105:934: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram||96||
1105:940: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate|
1105:942: tasya parasya duḥkhena mama bādhā pīḍā nāstītyato'smāt kāraṇād yadi na rakṣyate'nyaḥ,
1105:944: yato nāgāminaḥ kāyasya paralokabhāvino narakādijātasya duḥkhātmakasya [duḥkhānme] tasyopāttasya kāyasya kācidbādhā saṃbhavati,
1105:948: yata evam, tasmāt kenābhiprāyeṇa asau rakṣyate ?
1105:949: kāya iti prakṛtatvāt pāpānnivartanāt kuśale pravartanācca||
1105:954: ātmano nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt nirastatvācca leśataḥ tatko'yamahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati ?
1105:963: anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate||98||
1105:966: tadā na khalu yadeva skandhapañcakamiha vinaśyati,
1105:968: api tu apūrvameva pūrvanivṛttau tatra idaṃpratyayatāviśiṣṭaṃ kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtamantarābhavasaṃtatyā samutpadyate|
1105:971: yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam|
1105:975: tato yadā anyadduḥkhamanyasya rakṣituṃ na yujyate,
1105:976: tadā kathaṃ pādādau prahāraṃ patantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hastaṃ prasārya rakṣyate ?
1105:984: yato yadayuktaṃ yuktyā saṃgataṃ na bhavati,
1105:985: tannivartyamapasāryaṃ svakīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca yathābalaṃ yathāsāmarthyam|
1105:990: tadetaddvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamihaloke paraloke ca ātmaduḥkhāpaharaṇāderniyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyati|
1105:994: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati||101||
1105:995: saṃtāno nāma na kaścidekaḥ paramārthasan saṃbhavati|
1105:998: tasmādeteṣāmeva kṣaṇānāmekapadena pratipādanāya saṃketo kṛto buddhairvyavahārārthaṃ saṃtāna iti|
1105:1001: anyathā ātmanā kimaparāddhaṃ yenāsau na svīkriyate|
1105:1002: evaṃ samudāyo'pi na samudāyibhyo vastusan eko vidyate,
1105:1004: tattvānyatvavikalpastu asya avayavivicāreṇaiva gata iti neha pratāyate|
1105:1010: yathā anekeṣāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ svarūpamantareṇa paṅktirnāsti straksūtravadekāḥ,
1105:1011: yathā ca hastyaśvapadātiprabhṛtibhyo militebhyo vyatiriktā nānyā senā kācidekā tatrāsti,
1105:1013: etacca anyatra [9.73] vistareṇa vicāritamiti neha vicāryate|
1105:1016: evamātmādeḥ svāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvād yasya saṃbandhi duḥkhaṃ sa nāsti|
1105:1020: tadā kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhaviṣyati ātmavaditi ātmasattvavaditi ca ?
1105:1027: tadā tadabhiprāyeṇaiva svaparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tatpratyāyanārthaṃ sādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaścocyate,
1105:1030: idamupāttapañcaskandhamātramabhisaṃdhāya dṛṣṭānte dīyamāne na kācit kṣatiḥ,
1105:1041: duḥkhatvādeva svaparāvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāryāṇi niṣedhyāni bhavanti|
1105:1045: yena svakīyāni ca vāryāṇi na parakīyānīti|
1105:1046: evaṃ duḥkhatvāditi heturanaikāntiko na bhavatīti samarthitam||
1105:1047: nanu yadi duḥkhī nāma na kaścit saṃsāre saṃbhavati,
1105:1058: na ca abhyupagamamātreṇa tasya sattā prasidhyati tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
1105:1066: tadvaraṃ bahuduḥkhanidānaṃ saiva prathamato notpādayituṃ yujyata iti paravacanāvakāśaṃ śaṅkamāna āha-
1105:1071: jagato duḥkhaṃ narakādikṛtamanekaprakāraṃ samīkṣya idaṃ kṛpākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu ?
1105:1076: ekasya puruṣasya duḥkhena bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ vigacchati nivartate,
1105:1081: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt||106||
1105:1082: yata eva utpādyameva tadduḥkhaṃ kṛpālunā svaparātmanoḥ ata eva supuṣpacandreṇa bodhisattvena|
1105:1090: yaduktaṃ supuṣpacandrasyetivṛttake [samādhi. 35]-tathā hi-atīte'dhvani ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato'bhūt|
1105:1091: sa bhagavān buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā ciratarakālamavasthāya parinirvṛtaḥ|
1105:1092: tasmiṃśca parinirvṛte śāsanāntardhānasamaye rājā śūradatto nāma babhūva|
1105:1096: te ca tato rāṣṭrajanapadebhyo nirvāsitāḥ samantabhadraṃ nāma araṇyavanakhaṇḍamupasṛtya viharanti sma sārdhaṃ supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena|
1105:1097: atha khalu supuṣpacandrasya bodhisattvasya sattvān karuṇāyamānasya rahogatasya cetasi vitarka udapādi-yannvahaṃ janapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīrgatvā sattvān kumārgaprapannān kalyāṇe vartmani pratiṣṭhāpayāmi|
1105:1099: tairnivāryamāṇo'pi svayaṃ ca svāpadaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ tasya rājño'pi tato vanakhaṇḍānnirjagāma|
1105:1100: sa krameṇa dharmaṃ deśayan tasya rājño rājadhānīmanuprāpto bahūn sattvān rājaputrāmātyapurohitaprabhṛtīn prakāraṃ vinīya satpathe vyavasthāpayan tena rājñā dṛṣṭaḥ|
1105:1101: sahadarśanena prakuptaḥ sarva ca janakāyaṃ tadāvarjitaṃ pratipadya īrṣyādūṣitahṛdayaḥ|
1105:1104: tena tadājñāmanuvartamānena karacaraṇādicchedakrameṇa akṣīṇi ca saṃdaṃśikenoddhṛtya jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ|
1105:1105: atha tasya bhikṣo rājamārgagatasya jīvitād vyaparopitasya śarīre anekānyadbhutāni babhūvuḥ|
1105:1106: tāni pratipadya sa rājā niścitaṃ bodhisattva evāyaṃ bhikṣuriti paritāpagato bahutaraṃ paridevate sma|
1105:1108: vistareṇa punaḥ samādhirājasūtre [35] nirdiṣṭamiti tatraiva avadhāryam||
1105:1109: na cāpi kṛpāvatāṃ paraduḥkhaduḥkhināṃ mahadapi duḥkhaṃ bādhakamiti pratipādayannāha-
1105:1113: paraduḥkhena samaṃ tulyaṃ priyaṃ sukhaheturyeṣāṃ te tathā|
1105:1115: te avīcimavagāhante paravyasanasamuddharaṇāya tadduḥkhaṃ sukhameva manyamānāḥ|
1105:1117: āvīcikamapi duḥkhaṃ sukhameva parārthe yeṣāṃ te|
1105:1126: ata eva prāmodyasāgarāḥ saṃtuṣṭisamudrāḥ kṛpāvatāṃ saṃtāneṣu prādurbhavanti|
1105:1128: ataḥ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ|
1105:1135: paratvaṃ tu svakāyasya sthitameva na duṣkaram||112||
1105:1142: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ|
1105:1143: ātmānaṃ bhojayitvaiva phalāśā na ca jāyate||116||
1105:1160: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhokṣye ityātmārthe piśācatā|
1105:1161: yadi bhokṣye kiṃ dadāmīti parārthe devarājatā||125||
1105:1168: ye kecidduḥkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā|
1105:1172: na nāma sādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre'pi kutaḥ sukham|
1105:1174: āstāṃ tāvatparo loke dṛṣṭo'pyartho na sidhyati|
1105:1193: bhāvayerṣyāṃ ca mānaṃ ca nirvikalpena cetasā||140||
1105:1194: eṣa satkriyate nāhaṃ lābhī nāhamayaṃ yathā|
1105:1196: ahaṃ karomi karmāṇi tiṣṭhatyeṣa tu susthitaḥ|
1105:1197: ayaṃ kila mahāṃlloke nīco'haṃ kila nirguṇaḥ||142||
1105:1199: santi te yeṣvahaṃ nīcaḥ santi te yeṣvahaṃ varaḥ||143||
1105:1208: api sarvatra me loke bhaveyuḥ prakaṭā guṇāḥ|
1105:1209: api nāma guṇā ye'sya na śroṣyantyapi kecana||148||
1105:1210: chādyerannapi me doṣāḥ syānme pūjāsya no bhavet|
1105:1211: sulabdhā adya me lābhāḥ pūjito'hamayaṃ na tu||149||
1105:1214: asyāpi hi varākasya spardhā kila mayā saha|
1105:1215: kimasya śrutametāvat prajñā rūpaṃ kulaṃ dhanam||151||
1105:1226: abhaviṣyadidaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yadi tvayā|
1105:1247: evaṃ kuruṣva tiṣṭhaivaṃ na kartavyamidaṃ tvayā|
1105:1251: kva yāsyasi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sarvadarpānnihanmi te|
1105:1253: adyāpyasti mama svārtha ityāśāṃ tyaja sāṃpratam|
1105:1255: tvāṃ sattveṣu na dāsyāmi yadi nāma pramodataḥ|
1105:1256: tvaṃ māṃ narakapāleṣu pradāsyasi na saṃśayaḥ||171||
1105:1271: kiṃ mamānena yantreṇa jīvinā vā mṛtena vā|
1105:1272: loṣṭādeḥ ko viśeṣo'sya hāhaṃkāraṃ na naśyasi||179||
1105:1276: na ca sneho na ca dveṣastatra snehaṃ karomi kim||181||
1105:1277: roṣo yasya khalīkārāttoṣo yasya ca pūjayā|
1105:1278: sa eva cenna jānāti śramaḥ kasya kṛtena me||182||
1105:1279: imaṃ ye kāyamicchanti te'pi me suhṛdaḥ kila|
1105:1280: sarve svakāyamicchanti te'pi kasmānna me priyāḥ||183||
